title: Disguise Self
content:
Disguise Self Level 1 Illusion Spell Magically change all aspects of your appearance. Action Level 1 Spell Slot

Level 1 Illusion Spell

Magically change all aspects of your appearance.

Disguise self is a Spell in Baldur's Gate 3. Disguise self is a Lvl 1 Spell from the Illusion school. Spells can be used for dealing damage to Enemies, inflict Status Ailments, buff Characters or interact with the environment.
